title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave and resist
description: Small panel of printed and resisted cotton in red and cream. Red ground shows stlyized flower head and foliage in shape of circle, achieved by resist; details applied by block.

Textile, early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave and resist. Gift of Bertha Schaefer. 1962-18-4.
